about.body:
### On November 30 and December 1, we are teaming up with Chef Juan Pablo Parra of Veccina (Bogota, Colombia IG: @veccinaitaliano) serving a very special 7-course menu imagining Italian food in the Caribbean:

### Tropical Italian?!

### Find all the info in the [menu](https://cafemarsbk.com/menu/feast%20of%20the%20seven%20fishes/ "menu") and [book](https://www.exploretock.com/cafemarsbk/ "book it!") options!
